Reviews.Title: “Well furnished, quiet and good value”

Reviews.Content: stayed night found furnished condition located street laurel canyon quiet night blessing la fridge coffee maker wifi ethernet connection breakfast offered donuts bagels coffee juice satisfactory minimal staff friendly decent rate hotel wellmaintained central location prefer stay am los angeles

Reviews.Title: “Blood on my sheets”
Reviews.Author: Ricardo_Utah
Reviews.Content: checked hotel dec 24th 2010 wrote review fiance cut costs stay students utah simply dont money satisfied appearance location slept bed pulled sheets noticed massive stain sheets appeared blood pulled sheet discover blood stain pad below sheet immediately front desk sheets replaced office brought sheet replace sheet ourselves additional sheet realized hair bed previous tenant hesitant bring eventually brought door attempted complain corporate office closed unfortunately realized front office help brought sheet care attempted book hotel couldnt availability accept reservation time christmas recommend staying super 8 north hollywood california ca

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice, but I can see some of the points others have made...”
Reviews.Author: Cubdukat
Reviews.Content: real fairly else north hollywood public transit options practically nonexistent midnight couple mentioned reviewsthe strong antiseptic odor lobby pretty strong experience jacuzzi bed ive slept front desk friendly definitely coming itll rental car

Reviews.Title: “Adequate, but I'll spend more for something nicer next time.”

Reviews.Content: hotel expect super 8 motel bed looked pretty clean ours strongly smelled urine manager nice stuck urine location little sketchy hotel doors inward little worried cars spot front walls thin loud guests didnt sleep night youre looking cheap youll remember youre getting pay
